definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
healthy/to invigorate/to strengthen/to be good at/to be strong in

sentences.english: He was buoyed up by thinking that he would recover.
sentences.chinese: 他想到还会恢复健康，心情也就开朗起来。

sentences.english: She is depending on the diet to recover.
sentences.chinese: 她靠吃指定饮食来恢复健康。

sentences.english: The sick child is gaining and will soon be well.
sentences.chinese: 病孩正在好转，并将很快恢复健康。

sentences.english: China extends its congratulations and wishes them early recovery of health.
sentences.chinese: 中方对此表示祝贺，并祝愿获救矿工早日恢复健康。

sentences.english: En. Father's poor health! But, By now, his Body back to health.
sentences.chinese: 恩，父亲身体不好，不过现在已经恢复健康了。

sentences.english: There have been accounts of folk recovering their health in consuming mangosteen juice or tea.
sentences.chinese: 有很多人食用山竹果汁或山竹茶而恢复健康。

sentences.english: The galvanising presence of John Terry and penetrative wing-play of Arjen Robben cannot be restored quickly enough;
sentences.chinese: 和极有渗透性的边锋罗本都不能很快恢复健康。

sentences.english: The muscle strength of this patient improved steadily after extubation and a rehabilitation program.
sentences.chinese: 病人肌肉的力量在拔管后复健之中持续恢复。

sentences.english: Extra Strength Anti-Fungal Treatment kills fungus that can infect healthy nails.
sentences.chinese: 特强抗真菌治疗，可以杀死真菌，使指甲恢复健康。

sentences.english: He didn't recoup his health until recently.
Rick:The medical team says she still needs a long period of rehabilitation and care.
sentences.chinese: 医疗团队说还要很久的时间复健与照顾。

sentences.english: Stane seemed to be very much relieved and pleased at his recovery.
sentences.chinese: 史丹看到他恢复健康了，觉得既轻松又愉快。

sentences.english: Eating myrobalans is better for your recovery.
sentences.chinese: 吃点藏青果对你恢复健康有好处。

sentences.english: He is still ill, but the doctor is sure he will pull through.
sentences.chinese: 他还病着，但医生相信他一定会恢复健康。

definition: (Tw) weight training (abbr. for 重量訓練|重量训练[zhong4 liang4 xun4 lian4])
to recover completely (from illness or injury)
tracheotomy (abbr. for 氣管切開術|气管切开术[qi4 guan3 qie1 kai1 shu4])
to recover completely (from illness or injury)
to get well/to heal/to recuperate/to convalesce/convalescence/to nurse
